home.heading: Daniela Plamínková
home.subtitle: Graphic designer and video editor with experience in a wide range of areas within graphic design.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer – Imper (Saleskit)
jobs.description: Design of business materials such as presentations, lanyards, leaflets, LinkedIn banners.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer & Video Editor – JVS GROUP
jobs.description: Creative design work for exhibitions and concerts, including both graphic and video presentations. Responsibilities included creating social media banners, editing and producing promotional videos and TV commercials, and managing large-scale outdoor campaigns — such as billboards, venue graphics, and public transport wraps. Additional experience includes website editing (Wix), branding and logo creation. Also involved in photography, influencer interview production, 2D animations in After Effects, merchandise design, and occasional 3D visualizations using Unreal Engine and Cinema 4D.

jobs.title: DTP Operator – GZ Media
jobs.description: Preparing data for printing, performing color correction on prints, collaborating on the production of promotional materials, and operating printing machines.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer – BeefBrothers, s.r.o.
jobs.description: Internship focused on branding and campaigns.

jobs.title: Print & Packaging – ART D
jobs.description: Internship focused on packaging and print materials.
